enhanced_description: Khao Kan Jin is a beloved hearty and satisfying main course from northern Thailand that with a subtle warmth. Steamed rice with pork blood in banana leaf. This hard recipe takes about 60 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Northern Thai cuisine is characterized by milder flavors, sticky rice, and herbs. The combination of rice, pork blood, garlic creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
